Detailed Description

X10 runtime API draft.

Typedef Documentation

typedef int X10Runtime::am_handle_t
 

Handle to the registered active message handled

typedef void(* X10Runtime::am_t)(int nbytes, void *buf)
 

The active message handler type.

Parameters:
nbytes Number of bytes in buffer
buf Contents used to invoke the active message on the remote place.

typedef int X10Runtime::Place
 

The number of places supported should be larger that 1<<16. The exact definition can be machine dependent.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum X10Runtime::ProbeStatus
 

Activity::probe() status. Return values of Activity::probe() to indicate the status of the activity.

Enumerator:
acDone  Activity is done processing, and can be cleaned up
acClockWaiting  Activity is waiting on a clock
acFinishWaiting  Activity is waiting on a finish
